description: Detects file names used by different memory dumping tools to create a memory dump of the LSASS process memory, which contains user credentials
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: LSASS Process Memory Dump Files
query: ((file.path.text:("*\\lsass.dmp" OR "*\\lsass.zip" OR "*\\lsass.rar" OR "*\\Andrew.dmp" OR "*\\Coredump.dmp" OR "*\\NotLSASS.zip")) OR (file.path.text:("*\\lsass_2*" OR "*\\lsassdump*" OR "*\\lsassdmp*")) OR ((file.path.text:"*\\lsass*" AND file.path.text:"*.dmp*")) OR ((file.path.text:"*SQLDmpr*" AND file.path.text:"*.mdmp")) OR ((file.path.text:"nanodump*" AND file.path.text:"*.dmp")))
